content.question: Which of the following factors would contribute most to future revisions of Map 2 ?

choices.label: Western Europeans’ discovery of geographical scholarship from the Mongol khanates
The experiences of European merchants transporting Asian goods in the Indian Ocean
Spanish sponsorship of trans-Atlantic and trans-Pacific maritime exploration
Qing China’s resumption of maritime expeditions to expand its tribute system

content.answer: Spanish sponsorship of trans-Atlantic and trans-Pacific maritime exploration

topic.text: 4.2: Exploration - Causes and Events from 1450 to 1750

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
